info.title: Chatter service describing the streaming features of goa v2.

get.description: Echoes the message sent by the client.

schema.example: Excepturi ullam repellendus eius quis quos inventore.
Perspiciatis tenetur aut natus occaecati suscipit sapiente.

get.description: Returns the chat messages sent to the server.

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: View to use to render the result

schema.description: View to use to render the result

example.message: Ullam quia neque quis qui quia optio.

application/json.example: Reprehenderit autem necessitatibus esse unde adipisci.

get.description: Listens to the messages sent by the client.

schema.example: Aliquid voluptatem vitae error eveniet dolores sapiente.

application/json.example: Ducimus velit ipsam sequi beatae provident dolorum.

post.description: Creates a valid JWT token for auth to chat.

schema.example: Vero necessitatibus ullam sed maiores nobis.

application/json.example: Voluptatem reprehenderit amet sit ex corrupti.
Laborum dolorum officiis dignissimos hic est culpa.

get.description: Subscribe to events sent when new chat messages are added.

schema.example: Quo omnis quasi nihil quasi cumque.

application/json.example: Suscipit adipisci voluptas quia eligendi et.

get.description: Summarizes the chat messages sent by the client.

example.message: Similique tempora nesciunt repellendus ipsum quis.
Similique tempora nesciunt repellendus ipsum quis.

schema.example: Expedita in velit harum excepturi est iusto.

sent_at.description: Time at which the message was sent

example.message: Possimus qui hic perspiciatis modi quasi.

message.example: Eos eos velit dolorum consequuntur culpa adipisci.

sent_at.description: Time at which the message was sent

example.message: Eos veniam illum illum in molestiae.

added_at.description: Time at which the message was added

message.example: Maxime fugiat repellendus corporis dolorem voluptas sapiente.

example.message: Quo consequuntur labore id porro corrupti.

jwt_header_Authorization.description: Secures endpoint by requiring a valid JWT token. Supports scopes "stream:read" and "stream:write".

tags.name: chatter
tags.description: The chatter service implements a simple client and server chat.
